Change has been successfully merged
can you write commit message as paragraph?
Could you please elaborate more?
could you please explain more?

please do below 2 changes.
1.why this extra empty line is required?
2. replace 'remote terminus' instead 'remote PLDM terminus'

As paragraph:

This commits adds support to host PCIeSlot interface over DBus
when PLDM receives the PDR information from 'Remote terminus'.
PLDM hosts the PCIeSlot interface based on the entity type.
The Slot interface is defined at [1] :
Done
how did you test this can you add here?
Done

please use .contain

c_str not required.

redundant line.
Done
Archana, Changes look good. Some minor comments only.
Use shorter type aliases. Example: https://gerrit.openbmc.org/c/openbmc/pldm/+/71300
Done
use shorter type aliases here as well.
Done
and no unit tests ?

We have not implemented any get function for the properties under the interface.
So in the test we will not be able to verify.
ack, it was an oversight.
these two can be deleted.
